title: Obenan
description:
We provide Local SEO tools and AI tools that bring businesses to the top in local search results and maps, and automate online duties with unsupervised workflow.

Founded by a local entrepreneur from Amsterdam (NL), Obenan was established to help local business owners drive more traffic and revenue to their locations. Obenan offers Local SEO tools and AI tools that bring businesses to the top in local search results and maps, encouraging customers to choose them over their competitors.
